channel.title: Category on Utari
channel.description: Recent content in Category on Utari

item.title: Creating Category
item.description: First, we need to understand how to create a post then we will be able to create categories. Post Creation To create a post in your blog first you need to go to the folder named posts. Here, create a file _index.md(The file name has to be exactly the same as it is mentioned). Then open the file and add below lines: --- title: Posts --- now, save and close the file.
